title: Game Crashes

embed.description: this is just a personal problem. LoLCrash

body:
This happened after the 5.24 patch.

I open LoL
The opening screen reading "League of Legends" shows up 
gets 1/4-ish starting the download and crashes. 

I have uninstalled it and re-installed it, deleted lol_launcher among various other files this site has said and nothing seemed to have worked.
(dont know if the link works but if you can see that is how far its getting and crashing.

replies.body:
Hey MechanikalKorps,

Please try the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) and let me know if anything works for you!

Tried them all. None of them worked. But notice in the NA server i was missing the air client and when i went to the EU server i was missing the S_OK file. But those are for "Patcher Stops at 33% and/or Gives Unspecified Error Message", and i cant even get to the screen when it tells me how much percent its downloaded or it doesnt give me any error messages, just shuts down.

Oh, and still missing the S_OK file.

Hmm, it looks like it might be a connection issue. Give these solutions a shot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
well, i changed my server, it put the files i have been missing plus others then switched back and it fix the problem.

I  clicked on the server status it provided before troubleshooting and it tells me im connected just fine. >.< this is becoming nothing but a pain. Wasnt having any issues until the windows 10 upgrade and the patch made it so i cant open it entirely.

Please ensure that League of Legends is added as an exception to any firewalls/antivirus applications that you may have running. 

Additionally, can you confirm that your DNS servers are in fact set to 8.8.4.4 and 8.8.8.8, and that IP Helper and IPv6 are both disabled?

okay, so i fixed my LoL but my friend on a mac is having a similar problem (and yes the DNS is 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4) i ran the same procedure that fixed mine among the other connection issues from the thread you directed me at and i have come up with nothing. can you point me in the right direction?

Can you have your friend post Tracert results here?

How to: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#mq2
Where to upload: http://upload.wrenchmen.org/

Post link here, please :)
